page.title: 11Clubs - Playgroup,Youth,W.I.
page.content: Gorran Playgroup, started about 20 years ago, is for pre-school children of 3 to 5 years. It is held on three mornings each week, and run by a qualified leader and mothers of the 14 children attending. The Youth Club for young people aged 9 to 18 is held at Gorran Haven Institute on Fridays. Activities include table-tennis,darts, snooker,and various outings.It was started in 1973 and has over 40 members. The Women's Institute,held in the Church Rooms,has 42 members mostly in the 40 to 60 age range.In addition to the usual activities the W.I. also run drama,country dancing,and painting groups. The Retirement Club,formed 3 years ago,is for the over 60's.They meet weekly in the Church Rooms,and have talks,film shows,musical entertainments etc..There are 32 members, mostly women.
